full_summary:
=================================

**Solicitation Title**
-------------------

### Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) E60PV-22CS00 - Chemicals

### Procurement Notice

#### Published Date
------------------

* Publication Date: 2022-12-08
* Amendment Date: 2023-02-03

#### Tender Closing Date
----------------------

* Tender Closing Date: 2023-02-15T14:00:00 (EST)

#### Descriptor
--------------

Canada is soliciting a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) contract to renew the supply of chemical products, usable "as and when" by federal and provincial/territorial identified users.

#### Scope of Work
-----------------

* Procurement Category: Goods
* UNSPSC Code: 12000000 - Chemicals including Biochemicals and Gas Materials
* Production Description: Chemical products

#### Procurement Method
---------------------

* Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer
* Procurement Method: Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: Canada Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

#### Eligibility
--------------

This solicitation is open to all qualified suppliers. Submissions must be made electronically through Ariba Discovery.

#### Contact Information
----------------------

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services
* Contact Name: Sylvianne Beaulne
* Contact Email: sylvianne.beaulne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Note
------

Please disregard the original Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and offer must be submitted by 2023-02-15T14:00:00 (EST) to be considered.

#### Attachments
--------------

No attachments are available for this solicitation. All required documents are listed in the solicitation.

#### Related Links
------------------

The solicitation document can be found at http://discovery.ariba.com/r
